doc:
Charles Ray (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Charles_Ray_(actor) 0 Charles Edgar Ray (March 15, 1891 – November 23, 1943) was an American actor, director, producer, and screenwriter. Ray rose to fame during the mid-1910s portraying young, wholesome hicks in silent comedy films. Charles_Edgar_Ray ( March_15_,_1891 – November_23_,_1943 ) was an_American_actor , director , producer , and screenwriter . Ray rose to fame during the_mid-1910s portraying young_,_wholesome_hicks in silent_comedy_films .
